sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The agreement marks 15 years in negotiations, and it's directed at international waters that are not currently under the control or protection of nations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And while the treaty still needs to be formally adopted, campaigners are already praising the move.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Once enacted, it will create a new body to manage the conservation of ocean life and delineate protected zones in the high seas. It will also knit together different regional treaties, paving the way for conservation efforts to better protect a number of marine species, including dolphins, sea turtles, and many fish.
